title: The house Frank built
clue: Above the beautiful house four women stand guard out front.
hints: Ten windows and a chimney face the sidewalk.
Its on a two way street off S. Woodlawn

title: Mother Egg
clue: They guard the nest in the park. Watching over the fountain and and its 8 benches.
hints: Some call it the beautiful egg.

title: Queen of Funk
clue: Find Chaka Khan street, the one way street begins there.
hints: She’s known for her song "I feel for you" and "I'm every woman"
A park is located diagonally from her street.

title: Kissing rock
clue: The seven story building across the street watches over the corner.  Dorchester hangs on the lamppost.
hints: The president courted the first lady here.

title: Iron Flower
clue: Take a pic of the flower in the church window located on a street corner. Also, Jeffrey own a dollar store across the street.
hints: It has 12 pedals on the flower, the building is made of gray brick.
Across the street is a bank and market.

title: The Chicago Innovation Exchange
hints: Created by the University of Chicago
